about_the_game:
Having been pulled through time, into an unknown land, Gwyn must find her way out and try to get back to her own time. While searching for a way home she finds more than she bargained for.

Discover the world, story, and unlock its secrets in this 2D Platformer.
Level up and fight to keep the darkness at bay.

Moonlight District Ltd., Presents.

Midnight Memories: Sonata of the Soul

Features


- RPG Leveling system
- Dialogue choice system
